languages.text: "Вам не нужно доказывать свою полезность, Кассия. Каждый день я узнаю вас с новой стороны — и все они замечательные".

traits.locale_text: "Вам не нужно доказывать свою полезность, Кассия. Каждый день я узнаю вас с новой стороны — и все они замечательные".

languages.text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."
languages.original_text: "Вам не нужно доказывать свою полезность, Кассия. Каждый день я узнаю вас с новой стороны — и все они замечательные".

traits.locale_text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."
"You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."
"You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."
"You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."
"You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."

languages.text: “你并不需要向我证明你的价值，卡西娅。和你共度的每一天，都让我更加深入地了解你新的一面，你总能给我带来惊喜。”
languages.original_text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."

traits.locale_text: “你并不需要向我证明你的价值，卡西娅。和你共度的每一天，都让我更加深入地了解你新的一面，你总能给我带来惊喜。”

languages.text: "Ihr müsst mir Euren Wert nicht beweisen, Cassia. Mit jedem neuen Tag lerne ich neue Seiten an Euch kennen, und Ihr erstaunt mich jedes Mal wieder."
languages.original_text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst mir Euren Wert nicht beweisen, Cassia. Mit jedem neuen Tag lerne ich neue Seiten an Euch kennen, und Ihr erstaunt mich jedes Mal wieder."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas besoin de me prouver votre valeur, Cassia. Chaque jour qui passe, je découvre de nouvelles facettes de votre personnalité, et vous me surprenez toujours. »
languages.original_text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas besoin de me prouver votre valeur, Cassia. Chaque jour qui passe, je découvre de nouvelles facettes de votre personnalité, et vous me surprenez toujours. »

languages.text: «No necesita demostrarme su valía, Cassia. Cada día que pasa conozco nuevas facetas suyas y cada vez me sorprende más».
languages.original_text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."

traits.locale_text: «No necesita demostrarme su valía, Cassia. Cada día que pasa conozco nuevas facetas suyas y cada vez me sorprende más».

languages.text: 「カシア殿、あなたが自分の価値を私に証明する必要はない。日ごとに私はあなたの新たな一面を知り、いつも驚かされている」
languages.original_text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア殿、あなたが自分の価値を私に証明する必要はない。日ごとに私はあなたの新たな一面を知り、いつも驚かされている」

languages.text: "Bana kendini kanıtlamana gerek yok Cassia. Her geçen gün sana dair yeni şeyler öğreniyorum. Her seferinde de hayran kalıyorum."
languages.original_text: "You do not need to prove your worth to me, Cassia. With each passing day, I learn about new sides of you, and you amaze me every time."
